thread.title: Component companies to share in govt cash
thread.title_full: Component companies to share in govt cash

title: Component companies to share in govt cash
text:
Mon, Aug 3, 2015, 3:10 PM AEST - Australia Markets close in 50 mins. Component companies to share in govt cash AAP â€“ 54 minutes ago Print 
Nine auto component producers will share $5.7 million in federal funds to help them diversify their operations before the end of car manufacturing in Australia. 
Industry Minister Ian Macfarlane says the cash will allow the companies to shift their focus and plan for the future, while ensuring skills and jobs in Australian manufacturing are retained. 
"This is central to our commitment in ensuring a strong and sustainable manufacturing industry in Australia," the minister said in a statement. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Terms
